question: 焼き肉
sourceMnemonic: Mmmmm, yum! Take some <kanji>meat</kanji> and <kanji>cook</kanji> it. Then you have <vocabulary>grilled meat</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>yakiniku</vocabulary>. If you go to Japan look out for <ja>焼肉</ja> places (same meaning/reading). They are good, if you're into meat at least.
sourceReadingMnemonic: <ja>焼き</ja> uses the reading you learned with the kanji. <ja>肉</ja> does too. Put them on the grill and enjoy!
